mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.compound_name,c.synonym, c.cas_no, c.chemical_structure, c.mass_spectrogram, c.mass_spectrogram_nist, c.article FROM compound c WHERE c.is_deleted = 2 AND c.reviewer = #{email}

SELECT c.id, c.compound_name,c.synonym, c.cas_no, c.chemical_structure, c.mass_spectrogram, c.mass_spectrogram_nist, c.article FROM compound c WHERE (c.is_deleted = 0 OR c.is_deleted = 3) AND c.reviewer = #{email}

SELECT c.id, c.compound_name,c.synonym, c.cas_no, c.chemical_structure, c.mass_spectrogram, c.mass_spectrogram_nist, c.article, c.is_deleted FROM compound c WHERE c.is_deleted = 2 AND c.uploader = #{email}

SELECT c.id, c.compound_name,c.synonym, c.cas_no, c.chemical_structure, c.mass_spectrogram, c.mass_spectrogram_nist, c.article, c.is_deleted FROM compound c WHERE (c.is_deleted = 0 OR c.is_deleted = 3) AND c.uploader = #{email}
